label.ask_take_part: Want to take part in Secret Santa?
label.event_desc: The bot will randomly select another willing participant for you and also show their wishes!
info.registration_closed: Unfortunately, the New Year is already BREATHING IN YOUR BACK and registration for the event is closed.
info.santa_defined: The bot has determined a secret Santa for all participants!
info.member_has_no_wishes: There are no wishes, so {0} will be glad to receive any gift from you!
info.member_embed_desc:
{0} will be waiting for a gift from you!

info.not_yet:
At the moment the bot is waiting for more participants!
Secret Santas will be determined <t:{0}:f>
info.no_wishes: **You did not indicate any wishes for the gift!**
info.you_are_member: You are participating in Secret Santa!
info.you_are_no_longer_member: You are no longer participating in Secret Santa! If you want to go back, you can use the command `/secret_santa` again
info.few_users: Unfortunately, too few users are participating in the event. At least 2 participants are required to determine the Secret Santa.
